step_data.thought:
I've successfully adjusted the columns displayed in the shipment list by clicking the 'Columns' button and checking the 'Order Status' checkbox. Looking at the current state of the page, I can see that the 'Order Status' checkbox is now checked, as indicated by its 'checked=true' attribute in the accessibility tree. The text shows '8 out of 16 visible' which confirms that I've added one more column to the display (previously it was 7 out of 16). 

The goal was to adjust the columns displayed in the shipment list by clicking the Columns button, which I have successfully completed. I can now inform the user that the task has been completed.
step_data.action: stop('I have successfully adjusted the columns displayed in the shipment list. I clicked the Columns button and added the Order Status column to the display. The shipment list now shows 8 out of 16 available columns.')
